name: Refrigerator Samsung - Silver (RB46TS374SA/WT)
origAbout: Samsung Digital Inverter Compressor makes slight adjustments based on humidity levels and usage patterns. This helps maintain a more consistent temperature, reduces wear and tear on the compressor for greater reliability and keeps noise to a minimum. The Twin Cooling System in Samsung Refrigerators controls the refrigerator and freezer independently with two separate evaporators and precise electronic control. An adequate amount of cool air is provided in each compartment independent of the other. Temperature sensors detect which compartment needs cooling and enables the refrigerator and freezer to use power only when their respective compartments need cool air.

details.name: Refrigerator Cooling System თანამბრად ანაწილებს ჰაერის ნაკადს მაცივარ კამერაში.
